Name: 逃离地球
About the game: This is a party-board race game. Your goal is to compete with your rivals and win the race. You can use various cards to trap your rivals and gain advantages for yourself; You can allocate your energy to roll a move dice. If your energy is out, you will be forced to take a rest. Also, there are different special cells in the race map, such as Teleport Cell / Change Position Cell / Random Event Cell etc. Make a full use of these special cells will help you a lot in the race! The winner of the game, which is one of the aliens， will get the battery and take the UFO to get away from the earth! You can either choose to play alone nor compete with your friends / other players online. Hope you can spend a fun time during playing!
